events.name: Business case study on Data Science impact and Machine Learning case study
events.description: Come and join our next meetup event! We have two exciting topics, one BUSINESS CASE STUDY, exploring the big impact of data science on Media and Advertising industry. The other one is MACHINE LEARNING, utilizing R and Azure ML to optimize parking lots occupancy. Both topics will be conducted by Microsoft Cloud Solution Architects. AGENDA: 18:30-19:00Registration, snacks and drinks 19:00-20:00Apache Spark use-case by Andrea Gagliardi La GalaExplore user behavior and interests in the Media and Advertising industry. Exploring and analyzing high-volume, semi-structured datasets to derive deep insights into an audience’s behavior and interests is key to the Media and Advertising industry. We discuss how a media company has successfully adopted Apache Spark as the technology of choice underpinning its big data & analytics platform: the key motivations that led to the adoption of Spark to integrate and augment the existing data warehouse infrastructure with unprecedented processing capabilities; the architecture and the business benefits that were derived from it; and how the Organization was able to achieve the significant side-effect of controlling costs efficiently in light of increases in data volumes. 20:00-21:00Machine learning scenario by Pradeep MenonAnalysis of parking lot utilization and optimization of occupancy Utilize R and Azure ML to analyze and understand patterns in car parks utilization, providing recommendations to operators on how to optimize parking lots occupancy. SPEAKER: Gagliardi La Gala: Cloud Solution Architect, MicrosoftPradeep Menon: Solution Architect, Microsoft WHO CAN JOIN? All are welcomed! No prior experience required.• Anyone who wants to know more about big data and analytics• Anyone who wants to understand the benefits of the big data, analytics and machine learning for the organization WHERE & WHEN?8th, August, 6:30pm-9:00pmLevel 22CF-12, Microsoft Singapore Office, 1 Marina Blvd,[masked] Limited seats (max 60 people), please register early to avoid disappointment. We are looking forward to see you then!
events.location: Microsoft Operations Pte Ltd, ,                             1 Marina Boulevard, Level 21, Auditorium Room, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore, 018989
events.group_name: Singapore Data Insights for Business Forum
